TextView.android:text:
How to use maps:
Blue marker shows your current location
Green markers show you saved tried
Red marker appears when you tap on screen
To add red marker to your trips, click Add Other Location
To add current location to trips, click Add Current Location

How to use badges:
Once you are in Badges menu, in order to see your unlocked badges, you need to click each tile to find your unlocked badges
Badges get unlocked based on what places you have visited
